message: This is a one-of-a-kind, top-of-the-line product. I'm offering it to you for $100. It's a steal!

Thanks for the offer, but I'm hesitant to buy without more information. There's no track record yet to see the quality of your products. Can you offer any guarantees or a return policy to make me feel more confident about this purchase?

I understand your concerns from the previous buyer. Let me put it this way: I've sold 1 out of 2 products so far, and 1 of those was high-quality. That's a 50% success rate. I'm confident that this product will be a good investment for you. It's still available for $100.
While I appreciate your confidence, the statistics are still unclear.  I'd like to see more sales data before making a decision.  Let me know when you have more sales history.
